named-query.name: receipttype.getAll
named-query.query: FROM ReceiptTypeEntity r ORDER BY r.priority

named-query.name: receipttype.getAllEnabled
named-query.query: FROM ReceiptTypeEntity r WHERE r.enabled = TRUE ORDER BY r.priority

named-query.name: receipttype.getAllDisabled
named-query.query: FROM ReceiptTypeEntity r WHERE (r.enabled = FALSE OR r.enabled IS NULL) ORDER BY r.priority
